document_data.name: Horace's Shirt Shop
document_data.mainbody: '''Horace's Shirt Shop''' was a clothing store in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]].
document_data.Geography: This shop was located in the [[Stormride]] neighborhood of Ravens Bluff, on the north side of [[Grismort Lane]] and west of [[Hippocampus Street]]. It was around the corner from the [[Friendly Familiar]].
document_data.History:
This store initially became famous, or infamous in some circles, for extravagant revelry clothing. Around [[1370 DR]], they expanded their inventory to feature first-rate plain garments. Many nobles and merchants soon noticed this change and began to covet them, buying such clothes in great numbers.

Around 1370 DR, there were rumors floating around that in the future another branch of the store might open in [[Ravens Bluff/Sixstar|Sixstar]] neighborhood of the [[Ravens Bluff/Uptown District|Uptown District]] or in the [[Ravens Bluff/Temple District|Temple District]].
